title: Jason
body:
My mother should really be in this game.
I'm going to get those game makers!
Answer right and mommy won't hurt you too. 
The same goes for these girls behind mâ€“--
 Cough cough* I mean women.... *Whispers "Sorry mommy..." to himself.*
Question time: What is my last name?
[[ Voorhees |Mothergood ]] [[ Voorhays |Motherbad ]]

title: Mothergood
body: Yay! Correct! Mother would be pleased!

title: Jill
body:
Ring Ring* What's your favorite scary movie? 
I wanted to be just like my cousin, so  I tried to kill her.<<normal>>
I shot my boyfriend in the dick... 
and metaphorically stabbed my lover/ghost face partner in the back...
Well okay, I also literally stabbed him in the heart. 
I killed my two best friends and tried to kill my entire family. All for fame.
What is my name?
[[ Jill Roberts |Okay ]] [[ Jill Prescott |Surprise ]]

title: Okay
body:
Okay that was no fun. You got it right...
Fine. One more question...
How did I die?
[[ Defibrillator to the Skull |Oops ]] [[ Shot in the chest |Correct ]]

title: Surprise
body:
Surprise... Wrong.
I win. Looks like I get to stab you and ask another question. <<stab>>
 How did I die?
[[ Defibrillator to the Skull |Oops ]] [[ Shot in the chest |Correct ]]

title: Oops
body:
Oops...Wrong! Time for a Stab-a-Thon....
Where do you want them? The arm, leg, side, chest? <<stab>>
 I can't decide. Maybe I'll just stab you EVERYWHERE.

title: Correct
body:
Correct... My fame-whoring aunt fried my brain and then shot me in the chest. B*tch.<<normal>>
 Oh well, so much for family...

title: Debbie
body:
Hello. I'm a mommy. 
My son was one of the original Ghost faces, but his slutty girl friend killed him. 
So I did what any mother would do... avenged my son.<<normal>>
Tell me sweetie, what is my name?
[[ Mrs. Macher |Nooo ]] [[ Debbie Salt |Yes ]]

title: Nooo
body:
Nope. Sorry your wrong. 
This is the part where I stab you and ask question number two. <<stab>>
 I'm a mom. I have to be strict with the rules.
 Question two... How did I die?
[[ Shot in the chest |Classic ]] [[ Killed by my partner |Nope ]]

title: Yes
body:
Yep, that's right.
Debbie Salt is my name or Mrs. Loomis, but don't you dare say anything about my angel son.
I guess I won't stab you yet.
Answer me this though... How did I die?
[[ Shot in the chest |Classic ]] [[ Killed by my partner |Nope ]]

title: Classic
body:
Classic Ghost face death. I was shot by greedy Cotton Weary over a freaking interview. 
Here I am, trying to avenge my only boy and that jerk wad is obsessing about fame. <<normal>>
 The nerve of some people.
 Anyway, next question: 
Why did I kill the fan favorite, Randy?
[[ He got in my way |wrong ]] [[ He insulted my son |Knife ]]

title: Nope
body:
No... I killed that idiot before he could do it to me.
Double crossing is kind of a thing in our line of work.<<stab>>
 I'm going to stab you now... However, I have one more question.
 Why did I kill the fan favorite, Randy?
[[ He got in your way |wrong ]] [[ He insulted your son |Knife ]]

title: wrong
body:
Ha! Like anything can get in the way of a mother and her son! <<stab>>
No he insulted my son and that made me a little knife happy.<<add>>
 Like I'm going to be now...

title: Knife
body:
Yup, Randy's outrageous insults well, made me a little knife happy. 
 Billy was a good boy. <<normal>>
It was the Prescott family. <<add>>
That dirt Sidney girl and her filthy mother.
